description: Yazi - 一款基于异步 I/O、用 Rust 编写的超快速终端文件管理器。

common_options.name: --chooser-file
tip: Write the selected files to this file on open fired

common_options.name: --client-id
tip: Use the specified client ID, must be a globally unique number

common_options.name: --cwd-file
tip: Write the cwd on exit to this file

common_options.name: --local-events
tip: Report the specified local events to stdout

common_options.name: --remote-events
tip: Report the specified remote events to stdout
